mapper.select: SELECT D.DELIVERY_NO , M.ID , M.NICK , S.DELIVERY_STATUS FROM DELIVERY D JOIN DELIVERY_STATUS S ON S.DELIVERY_STATUS_NO = D.DELIVERY_STATUS_NO JOIN ORDERS O ON O.ORDER_NO = D.ORDER_NO JOIN MEMBER M ON M.MEMBER_NO = O.MEMBER_NO ORDER BY DELIVERY_NO DESC

SELECT D.DELIVERY_NO , M.ID , M.NAME , M.NICK , M.TEL , D.ADDRESS_NO , TO_CHAR (D.DELIVERY_START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS START_DATE , TO_CHAR (D.DELIVERY_FINISH_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS FINISH_DATE , S.DELIVERY_STATUS FROM DELIVERY D JOIN DELIVERY_STATUS S ON S.DELIVERY_STATUS_NO = D.DELIVERY_STATUS_NO JOIN ORDERS O ON O.ORDER_NO = D.ORDER_NO JOIN MEMBER M ON M.MEMBER_NO = O.MEMBER_NO WHERE D.DELIVERY_NO = #{deliveryNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE DELIVERY SET DELIVERY_STATUS_NO = #{deliveryStatusNo} WHERE DELIVERY_NO = #{deliveryNo}
